name: Anorith
description: ANORITH was regenerated from a prehistoric fossil. This primitive POKéMON once lived in warm seas. It grips its prey firmly between its two large claws.

abilities.name: Battle Armor
abilities.effect: Moves cannot score critical hits against this Pokémon.  This ability functions identically to shell armor.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during rain.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed in rain.
